about_the_game:
Sector 666 - The Forgotten Zone is an open-ended cyberpunk RPG.

Sector 666 wasn’t so bad at one time….
Corporations took interest in the city for its thriving economy.
Soon their interest turned into greed,
they took every opportunity to extort the working class.
The Government was quickly corrupted,
and as a result propaganda is spewed through every outlet.
Everyone’s happiness soon dissolved to nothing.
Will you join the fight and find happiness once again?

Features :

  • Energy : Feeling tired? I bet you are! Get energized with a nice Moon Mist, and maybe enjoy a pizza or a bag of chips! There's dozens of food items that can be bought, and used.
  • Drugs & Alcohol : Remember that bit about finding 'Happiness'? Well some people in Sector 666 prefer to engage in the use of alcohol and narcotics to boost their moods, abilities, and energy. Those same people also might-kinda suffer addiction issues, but hey who are you to judge?
  • Tons of Useable Items : Need a hacking device? Maybe a sledgehammer? Well whatever it is, search the shops and find what you need! There are dozens of useable tools / items current available.
  • Weapons : Going 'Hunting'? Or maybe you just need some personal protection...Well too bad! The corrupt Government has banned all weapons in an effort to suppress the citizens from fighting back. Don't get it twisted, criminals still find ways to smuggle weapons in but it'll take some searching. There's a few weapons currently available to purchase / find.
  • Legal Jobs : Is living the straight & narrow your type of life? Or maybe you're just tired of bashing police drones for their parts. Either-way, check the job listings for work. Some will pay better than others, but you know what they say...."Find a job doing something you love."
  • Illegal Activities : There's numerous ways to break the law, but only so many are profitable! Bash police drones - steal their expensive parts and sell them to the black-market, maybe selling narcotics or illegal items is your vibe. Just watch out, too much attention will surely be bad.
  • Missions : Fight greedy corporations, and avoid the Government at all costs. Find some friends along the way, its always good to have someone watching your back in this city. Talk to people and help them with their own issues, you never know what you'll get in return. Start your pursuit of happiness, find love and fulfillment. Most importantly....SURVIVE

Early-Access & Development :

  • Interested in supporting the game?
  • Want early access to the game?
  • Want a cool role on discord with special access to the development section where you can suggest new features or ideas for the game as it progresses?

Become a supporter today by purchasing the game in Early Access :)

name: Sector 666 - The Forgotten Zone

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4400 or AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 4200+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon X1900 GT or NVIDIA GeForce GT 340
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

short_description: You've lived in Sector 666 for most of your life. While surviving is difficult, you've been awoken to the harsh truth about the city. Greedy corporations have trashed the sector, and the Government spreads propaganda through all outlets. Will you fight back and find happiness again?
